testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to add items to the to-do list
testcase.system-out: Given Web chrome is Open....................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed When User enters Prepare Coffee,Go to Work,Wrap Up work,Sleep on Time in To-do list text box.passed Then User is able to see the entered Prepare Coffee,Go to Work,Wrap Up work,Sleep on Time in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to add items to the to-do list 2
testcase.system-out: Given Web edge is Open......................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed When User enters Meet Vishal,Submit Assignments,Play Chess in To-do list text box.passed Then User is able to see the entered Meet Vishal,Submit Assignments,Play Chess in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to edit the added items to the to-do list
testcase.system-out: Given Web chrome is Open....................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play football in To-do list text box...........passed When User edits the existing Play Cricket,Play football with Do not play Cricket,Do not Play Football.passed Then User is able to see the entered Do not play Cricket,Do not Play Football in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to edit the added items to the to-do list 2
testcase.system-out: Given Web edge is Open......................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play football in To-do list text box...........passed When User edits the existing Play Cricket,Play football with Do not play Cricket,Do not Play Football.passed Then User is able to see the entered Do not play Cricket,Do not Play Football in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to delete the added item from the to-do list
testcase.system-out: Given Web chrome is Open....................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket in To-do list text box.........................passed When User deletes an entry from existing Play Cricket.......................passed Then User is not able to see the deleted entry Play Cricket in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to delete the added item from the to-do list 2
testcase.system-out: Given Web edge is Open......................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket in To-do list text box.........................passed When User deletes an entry from existing Play Cricket.......................passed Then User is not able to see the deleted entry Play Cricket in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to check the added items as completed on the to-do list
testcase.system-out: Given Web chrome is Open....................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey in To-do list text box.passed When User marks the existing Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey as completed from list of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed Then Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey value out of all the Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey is shown as completed.passed And items left counter reflects the changes caused by Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey items out of all Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to check the added items as completed on the to-do list 2
testcase.system-out: Given Web edge is Open......................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey in To-do list text box.passed When User marks the existing Play Football as completed from list of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed Then Play Football value out of all the Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey is shown as completed.passed And items left counter reflects the changes caused by Play Football items out of all Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to clear all the completed items on the to-do list
testcase.system-out: Given Web chrome is Open....................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey in To-do list text box.passed And User marks the existing Play Cricket,Play Hockey as completed from list of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed When User clicks on Clear completed button..................................passed Then User is not able to see the deleted entry Play Cricket,Play Hockey in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to clear all the completed items on the to-do list 2
testcase.system-out: Given Web edge is Open......................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey in To-do list text box.passed And User marks the existing Play Football as completed from list of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed When User clicks on Clear completed button..................................passed Then User is not able to see the deleted entry Play Football in the To-Do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to view the appropriate values using filters on landing page of to-do list
testcase.system-out: Given Web chrome is Open....................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey in To-do list text box.passed And User marks the existing Play Cricket,Play Hockey as completed from list of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed When User clicks on Completed button........................................passed Then User only sees the Completed set of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey and Play Cricket,Play Hockey in the to-do list.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Todo List Page
testcase.name: Validate that User is able to view the appropriate values using filters on landing page of to-do list 2
testcase.system-out: Given Web edge is Open......................................................passed And User is on To-do list page..............................................passed And User enters Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey in To-do list text box.passed And User marks the existing Play Football as completed from list of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey.passed When User clicks on Active button...........................................passed Then User only sees the Active set of Play Cricket,Play Football,Play Hockey and Play Football in the to-do list.passed
